Dear Everyone,
I HATE POT.
I hate potheads.
I hate when people think they're cool.
I hate the way people act when they're high.
I hate what people will go through to get it.
I hate when people base their lives around it.
I hate the way it makes me feel when I'm around it.
I hate when people will not call their friends so they can go smoke pot.
I hate when, after doing all this, some of you then complain that you're not going to get into college.
I hate the fact that all of my one-time best friends that I now have little or no contact with anymore are all potheads.
I hate anyone that is going to comment on this and tell me I'm wrong/try to defend themselves/try to explain anything to me. I don't care if I'm being gay about it. I don't care what you have to say anymore to be honest with you, and if you try to say anything, I will gladly admit that I'm stubborn and will tell you to fuck off.

If you are planning on getting high, or have any "awesome" stories about getting high, I don't fucking care. Don't tell me about it because honestly, I don't think you're cool, I don't think it's awesome, and my respect level for you as a human being just goes away.

I hate you.

hello live journal people.....so here was my day

called alli bright and early...we got our summer registration done and shit like that, i think if it werent for alli helping me out with this, id be a lazy bitch and not do it, so much thanks to her on that.

then i did some shit around my aunts house, rode the bike around to the park and everything cuz im a fat shit and i need to lose weight. 

then i got my grandparents from my aunts house in staten island and went back to nj. 

band practice was supposed to happen today in prep for our supposed show tomorrow, however both of those things went down the tubes. 

i hung out with matt around like 630ish, we were planning on going to the band practice, shya, that fell through. so then mike calls me up, i havent seen mike in like 23423412 years, or so it seems, so i went and met up with them and plethera of the other nerds at annas house. i got to see chris d. and matt fav which was cool, ryanXYZ came over too which rocked the hizouse. so basically we watched gothica while all the little annoying biatches were talking during the movie. the movie rocked...as soon as it was over allison pulled a very clever prank on me...got me real good :). so me and matt decided shortly after that, that we should give tim a call...since he interuptted during the movie...(bastard!)..ne way...so matt and i met up with tim and yuri fain at CRAPplebees...had a bite to eat. good times. we decided to take a ride over to my friend mike liebes' place to see how he prepared for his "velvet rope" party. sometimes i wonder what goes on in my friend's heads...people have to dress in a dress shirt and tie to get in...its kinda gay yet it can be funny...not sure if im going. i stood there for maybe like 25 minutes then went home..

i got home and woke up my mom out of a coma to tell her i was there lol. then i called alli. we talked for a good 2 hours about tons of stuff.our conversations are the best. a few things came up though and got my mind racing. she feels like i act shady sometimes towards her and it tears me apart. being shady towards her is the last thing i wanna do. all i want is to make this work out between the 2 of us. this girl means everything to me, as if all you morons already didnt know that. i gotta pick it up now and get back into relationship mode because im sucking at it.
